title: The Dredd Interview: Having The World’s Biggest Unit, Sky Bri, Lana Rhoades & More
description:
Shout out to our Partners over at PrizePicks. Looking for the best Daily Fantasy App? Download PrizePicks today and get active with us! Use promo code NO JUMPER for your 100% deposit match up to $100 after you sign up

https://app.prizepicks.com/sign-up?in...

-----
Dredd finally made his way to Adam's couch! They go in depth about the industry, how to stay healthy, being seasoned to give your all to your partner(s), and more!

00:00 Intro
2:00 Having a good reputation in this business is wildly important 
4:40 S/O Abigail Mack 
6:51 Got late into the game, was a fan of the industry since he was 7, knew he could do it 
9:38 Used to be flown out to meet with couples without getting paid 
10:12 Won a contest, they were looking for a guy with a huge one, they called him back the next day 
11:06 First scene, Dredd was terrified by the production and quit right after, came back in 2015
12:40 Ad Price Pix
22:04 This industry is the biggest thing in the world but no one talks about it 
24:43 Adam showing the industry thru podcasts etc, that it is more than just one thing 
25:17 Dredd used to use tricks to get him going, but not anymore because it could be dangerous
33:08 Making money for doing this is still mind blowing to him 
35:27 Explains how he singed his contracts and being exclusive comes with perks
38:30 How to enhance what you have
40:10 People think Dredd actually got enhancement while he was taking time off
41:40 Dredd just turned 50, most men are outta the game by then, as long as your body is good, you're good 
42:57 Says he could go for another 10 years
45:46 Dredd loves loves the back door and knows how to do it well
48:09 Adam and Dredd love the back door action
49:04 Dredd working with Sky Bri, Dredd rates her performance
51:55 Lana Rhodes regrets being in the industry, Dredd says she's hypocritical for talking down about it 
56:57 IS there a down side to be big? Sky Bri was ready for Dredd
1:05:05 Dated here and there but was in a real long term relationship so he's enjoying being single for now

-----
